title: Why Hamilton matching Schumacher’s record is so remarkable
description: Lewis Hamilton equaled a record once considered to be unbreakable at the Nurburgring, where Daniel Ricciardo ended Renault’s long wait for a return to the F1 podium.
itunes:title: Why Hamilton matching Schumacher’s record is so remarkable
itunes:author: ESPN, Alexis Nunes, Laurence Edmondson, Nate Saunders
itunes:subtitle: Lewis Hamilton equaled a record once considered to be unbreakable at the Nurburgring, where Daniel Ricciardo ended Renault’s long wait for a return to the F1 podium.
itunes:summary: Lewis Hamilton equaled a record once considered to be unbreakable at the Nurburgring, where Daniel Ricciardo ended Renault’s long wait for a return to the F1 podium.
